verses.name: Revelation 20:6
verses.text: Blessed and holy is he that hath part in the first resurrection: on such the second death hath no power, but they shall be priests of God and of Christ, and shall reign with him a thousand years.

verses.name: Revelation 20:7
verses.text: And when the thousand years are expired, Satan shall be loosed out of his prison,

verses.name: Revelation 20:8
verses.text: And shall go out to deceive the nations which are in the four quarters of the earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them together to battle: the number of whom is as the sand of the sea.
